projectsDescription: A few parts are highly technical. If you are interested in those, please check them out.

This Website.description: A complete revision of my personal website. I switched from Flask to Django and now use TailwindCSS.

Public Django Website Framework.description: My personal Django Framework I will use to build new websites faster and more effectively. I include the fundamentals to build an Api and optimized the folder structure.

IDWW - A Webapp and Instagram scraper.description: A large instagram scraper built with Django that uses an API to communicate between user and program. The Scraper can be scaled seaminglessly and uses proxies. I built it to gather data for further Data-Science projects, so I used the Nominatim Geolocator and Regex to extract and order as much data as possible. I recommend you check out the README.

MainServerModule - Communicating with Fl.description: A collection of modules that can A) securely connect to multiple of my Flask project APIs and exchange data aswell as periodically update the API-Key using Fernet-encryption B) Populate my Flask Webapp Framework C) Generate a basic PDF invoice.

TheTradersCircle (Branding & Strategy).description: My client wanted to build an online community to teach others trading. I built a compelling logo and made a brand framework, and also helped a little with the overall business strategy.

Personal Brand.description: In this project I redefined how I position myself to find clients that fit to me and how to build the right kind of recognition around me.
